Dinesh Khara recommended for SBI Chairman post by BBB.

One-time restructuring of loans: Kamath panel to work out fine print. Borrowers can  get loan of up to 90% of value of pledged gold: RBI. RBI sets up panel under K V Kamath to suggest steps for Covid-19 related stressed assets.
Canara Bank slashes MCLR by up to 30 bps across various tenors.

ICICI Bank profit rises 36% on stake sales in subsidiaries.
NPAs set to rise sharply on COVID impact, financial system remains sound, says RBI.

Amid rising bad loans, losses and COVID disruption, bank staff to get 15% salary hike. Former RBI Guv Urjit Patel says insolvency law caused rift with central government. Gross NPA of banks may rise to 12.5 per cent by March 2021: RBI Financial Stability Report.
Capital conservation for banks important as moratorium ends on August 31: SBI report.
‘Centre can fund deficit at lower rates through direct monetisation’.
PNB-led consortium likely to move court seeking release of assets worth Rs 1,000 cr attached by ED.
Recovery could lose steam due to partial lockdown: Aditya Puri.
EPFO Board members raise red flags over lack of info on investment returns, files lost in December fire.
Banks, RBI deploy close to Rs 8K cr to ease MF liquidity. SBI plans ‘work from anywhere’, to save Rs 1,000 cr.
Credit offtake falls Rs 1.81 lakh crore in April, May.

IDBI Bank to sell 27% in insurance JV, Belgian firm raises stake to 49%. RBI extends higher overnight borrowing facility of banks to September.
RBI board takes stock of economy, rate transmission; no decision on loan recast. Govt to launch floating rate savings bond from July 1.

In talks with RBI to recast loans for companies: Sitharaman. RBI Governor briefs central board about impact of monetary steps. UCO Bank Q4 net profit at Rs 16.78 crore.
Govt brings co-op banks under RBI supervision for better regulation. RBI warns banks, NBFCs on lack of transparency in digital transactions.

Fall in bad loans, lower provisioning help PNB cut losses; reports Rs 2,617 cr NPA divergence.

Private banks overtake PSBs in number of borrowers, raise share in loan outstanding. From rate cut to moratorium extension: Top announcements by RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das. Loan EMIs set to get cheaper as RBI cuts repo rate. RBI extends moratorium on loans by three months.
